level.heading: Penalties.
level.text: Any person who knowingly and willfully causes any document not to be published in the District of Columbia Statutes-at-Large, the District of Columbia Register, or the District of Columbia Municipal Regulations which is required to be so published pursuant to this subchapter shall be guilty of a misdemeanor and shall be fined not more than $100, or imprisoned not more than 30 days, or both.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-153
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-153, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-505.
